summary:
- **New Employee Incentive Issuance**: 641,125 unquoted employee rights (EMPLOYEE RIGHTS FY25) issued under an incentive scheme (not yet ASX-quoted).  
- **Vesting Terms**: Vesting conditional on continuous employment until 30 June 2026; expiry on 30 June 2027. Each right converts to one ordinary share upon exercise.  
- **Impact on Capital Structure**: Potential dilution of ~0.03% (641,125 new shares) if all rights vest/exercise vs. current ordinary shares on issue (2.43B).  
- **No Material Trading Impact**: Non-quoted securities with transfer restrictions; no immediate liquidity effect.  

*Note: Routine employee incentive issuance with minor dilution risk—no other material capital markets implications.*
